nodes.text: The kus'nar gladiatorial games was a popular event on the planet Coyn. They were held in the Rols'Kus, a 250,000-seat amphitheater. The Coynites viewed the games as sport; games were held every night and during holidays, day-long contests were held. Contests included brawling and melee combat, shooting ranges for archaic guns, blasters, and bows. Young warriors dream of being crowned the Tawws'Kroyn, or "Most Honorable Champion Warrior."
